dialog: Magical Assistance, is there anything I can cast a spell for you on?
Yes, I am afraid there are not enough outlets for my wand.
Well, we have 6 for each chamber.
Yes, but 4 of them have been cursed. Can you send a wizard to repair them?
OK, wizard, please wait a moment.
Why did you stop me?
Are you aware that you rode through a red stop spell?
I ran a red stop spell?
Yes, you did.
I apologize, but I didn't realize that I did.
Weren't you taught that yellow means slow down, not speed up?
I was taught that.
So, then why did you speed up?
I don't know what to tell you.
I'm going to have to issue you a citation.
I understand.
Here you go. Don't break wizarding laws again.
Can I have the roll of enchanted film developed here?
Certainly, wizard.
Here is the enchanted film. Can I retrieve my pictures tomorrow?
